topics.body:
"@SidewardManatee":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554254e66368720307110100#post_554254e66368720307110100
Let's all be real here for a second:
If all the fictional creatures from anime/manga were real within generation human-human marriage would be unheard of.




Dear Diary:
Today I found true love; I found out what a .700 caliber hand cannon is.
!http://www.theblaze.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/12/700-caliber-rifle.jpg!
This is the bullet it takes:
!http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/dd/700NExpress.jpg/220px-700NExpress.jpg!
It's so overpowered that it's straight up impractical.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

But, like, in a legal setting.

topics.body:
"@PaskaNaakka":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5542570d63687227bd8e0f00#post_5542570d63687227bd8e0f00
To put it another way if you were to shoot a person with that gun it would literally turn them into paste all over the wall.  There's been unconfirmed cases in wartime of guns that fire bullets half that size ripping people in half from a mile away.  If you were to shoot a hand cannon at even a legendary deathclaw it would kill it.

"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5542576463687203073a0300#post_5542576463687203073a0300
You literally can only fit one bullet at a time in it.

.700 caliber hand cannons: so overkill that there's no practical use for them.
